meanings.sent1: She is redefining the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: The artist is redefining traditional art techniques.
meanings.sent3: By redefining the recipe, she accidentally made a new dish.
meanings.sent4: His innovative approach is redefining the industry standards.
meanings.sent5: Redefining the concept of beauty can lead to new perspectives.

meanings.definition: To change the meaning or interpretation of something.
meanings.sent1: The author is redefining the character's backstory.
meanings.sent2: The new evidence is redefining the case.
meanings.sent3: By redefining the joke, he made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her speech redefining freedom resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: Redefining history can help us understand the present better.
